Text:
Let us Pray.
Visit this home, Lord. We pray You will make this place safe from every snare of the enemy. [t] That Your peace would dwell here and protect us through the holy power of Your Kingdom. [*] Let Your blessing be upon us forever. Through Jesus Christ, our Lord.
Amen.

Extra.BreviaryInstructions: For the Easter Triduum, and Solemnities occurring during the week.

Changes: 2023-08-30 - Paul Prins: Retranslated this prayer to fit with other compline concluding prayers
2022-08-01 - Paul Prins: Change abbreviation and add instructions.
